Name: Pulverized Iridium
Description: Large pile of pure iridium, must be smelted in an Electric Furnace, can be fused with a Prismatic Shard.

DescriptionLocalization.zh: 一大堆纯净的铱粉，必须在电炉里冶炼。
DescriptionLocalization.de: In Pulver zermahlenes reines Iridium. Muss in einem Elektro-Ofen geschmolzen werden.
